Structure# PredicateExpressions.Comparison

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
struct Comparison<LHS, RHS> where LHS : PredicateExpression, RHS : PredicateExpression, LHS.Output : Comparable, LHS.Output == RHS.Output
```

- [`StandardPredicateExpression`](/documentation/foundation/standardpredicateexpression)Conforms when `LHS` conforms to `StandardPredicateExpression`, `RHS` conforms to `StandardPredicateExpression`, `LHS.Output` conforms to `Comparable`, and `LHS.Output` is `RHS.Output`.
